text.more:
This bipartite, directed network represents the relationships between cinema nodes and film nodes in Ghent during the period 1951–1953. Each edge in the network indicates that a specific cinema screened a particular film. The edges are weighted, reflecting the duration of time the given film was screened at the respective cinema.
This network illustrates the dynamics of cinema structure and film exhibition in Ghent during this historical period (1951–1953).
Node color code: dark green = cinemas, light green = films, yellow = TOP films (films identified as particularly popular in the city during the research period).
text.intro:
Cinema-Film Network in Brno, 1951–1953
Node color code: 
dark green = cinemas
light green = films
yellow = TOP films
text.title: Cinema Network - Brno
